Name: LIFESPAWN
About the game: INTRODUCTION LIFESPAWN is a 2D platformer with a difference: you place your own checkpoints... good luck. GAMEPLAY Jump your way from grassy fields to rustic killhouses, climb to the heights of a skyscraper and dive deep into the depths of hidden sewers in one long, long level. However, there are no checkpoints. Instead, you have 3 placeable hearts that you'll respawn at when you die. 3 hearts, one level and a world of heartbreak and rage may be your future depending on your heart placement. STORY Although there is no direct story, you may find signs of something being ever so slightly wrong with the world of LIFESPAWN... FEATURES A Sprawling World Unique Heart Gameplay
